downloadTitle: Team System Web Access 2008 Scalability Limits White Paper
downloadDescription: This document explains the scalability limits of Team System Web Access 2008.

downloadFile.name: Team System Web Access 2008 Scalability Limits.xps
Team System Web Access 2008 Scalability Limits.docx
Team System Web Access 2008 Scalability Limits.pdf

detailsSection: This document explains the scalability limits of Team System Web Access 2008 power tool and provides workarounds to improve the total number of concurrent users that Web Access can support.
detailsSection_file_name: Team System Web Access 2008 Scalability Limits.xps
Team System Web Access 2008 Scalability Limits.docx
Team System Web Access 2008 Scalability Limits.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the DOCX file, you will need Microsoft Office Word 2007.
  • To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in DOCX, PDF or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
